      Methods in io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.services that return IPlatformScheduler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPlatformScheduler IPlatformScheduler.cancel()
      Cancel all queued scheduled jobs and terminate the timer threads as soon as possible.
      IPlatformScheduler IPlatformSchedulerProvider.get()
      Creates a new platform scheduler or reuses the previously created one.
      IPlatformScheduler IPlatformScheduler.scheduleForImmediateExecution(Runnable job)
      Schedule a single job for immediate background execution.
      IPlatformScheduler IPlatformScheduler.stopSchedule(String jobKey)
      Stop the scheduled job, identified with a key.
